attributes.action: reduce the tax burdon on families or couples who wish to undertake post graduate study.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Post graduate study in order to create a better work force, such as teachers who create research in to their field to improve its quality is undermind by the local taxation policy in this country.  Tax relief should be available for people who chose to study part or full time, and the most any recognised partnership should be expected to pay for council tax if  1 partner is in fulltime post graduate education and 1 being in part-time post graduate study is 25%.
